description: A React functional component named Hero that renders a responsive hero section with a headline, text, call-to-action button, and an animated illustration with parallax tilt and reveal effects.

methods.name: Hero({ title = 'Food Delivery', text = 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.', ctaLabel = 'CONTACT', illustrationSrc = '/assets/hero-home.jpg', onCtaClick })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a hero section with interactive and animated features, accepting props for customization.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles click events on the call-to-action button, invoking the provided onCtaClick callback if available.

methods.name: handleMouseMove
methods.description: Calculates and applies a subtle parallax tilt to the illustration container based on mouse position.

methods.name: handleMouseLeave
methods.description: Resets the illustration tilt when the mouse leaves the container.

ctags.name: Hero
ctags.signature: ({ title = 'Food Delivery', text = 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.', ctaLabel = 'CONTACT', illustrationSrc = '/assets/hero-home.jpg', onCtaClick })
